BusinessOverview.TargetMarket: Athletes, fitness enthusiasts, health-conscious individuals, Yoga studios, yoga retreats, massage studios

MarketPositioning.MarketStrategies: Focus on natural ingredients, no additives, competitive pricing, strong branding
MarketPositioning.UniqueSellingPropositions: farmecutical grade salts, enhanced absorption formula, eco-friendly packaging
MarketPositioning.GrowthObjectives: Increase market share to 10% within two years

CustomerInsights.CustomerPersonas: Fitness Fred, Health-conscious Hannah, Athlete Allie, Yoga Yolanda
CustomerInsights.SegmentationCriteria: Activity level, health goals, purchasing behavior
CustomerInsights.PreferencesBehaviors: Preference for natural products, frequent online shopping, engagement with fitness content

MarketingGoalsObjectives.ShortTermGoals: Boost online sales by 15% in the next quarter
MarketingGoalsObjectives.LongTermGoals: Establish the brand as a leader in the hydration market
MarketingGoalsObjectives.KeyPerformanceIndicators: Customer acquisition cost, conversion rate, customer lifetime value

CurrentMarketingStrategies.MarketingChannelsTactics: Social media advertising, whatsapp marketing, content marketing
CurrentMarketingStrategies.ContentStrategy: Educational content on hydration, Educational contnet on the dangers of aditives, user-generated content, testimonials
CurrentMarketingStrategies.PerformanceMetricsPastCampaigns: 30% increase in website traffic, 20% conversion rate

DataAnalytics.DataSources: Google Analytics, customer surveys, market research reports
DataAnalytics.InsightsPreviousDataAnalysis: High engagement with fitness-related content, strong brand loyalty among repeat customers

BudgetResources.AvailableResources: Marketing team of 1, in-house graphic designer
BudgetResources.ConstraintsLimitations: Limited budget for TV advertising, reliance on online channels
